title: BARD - Captain Underpants
itunes:title: BARD - Captain Underpants
description:
Mark and Adam link up in studio to discuss a variety of topics including the attack on Paul Pelosi and the various media reactions as well as the Supreme Court ordering Lindsey Graham to testify in the Georgia inquiry. 

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
